title: Jeremy James oder Elefanten sitzen nicht auf Autos. ( Ab 8 J.).
description: When Jeremy James tells his mother that an elephant is sitting on his Daddy's car, his mother replies, "But elephants don't sit on cars!". Or do they? If there's trouble about--with elephants, babysitters, burglars or a shopping trip to the supermarket--Jeremy James will find it.
author: David Henry Wilson
